hints.content:
Ahmed made $\maroonD{625}$ milliliters of fruit smoothie in his blender. 

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A graduated cylinder labeled with tick marks from 100 milliliters to 700 milliliters. Tick marks 100, 200, 300, 400, 500, 600, and 700 milliliters are labeled. 3 unlabeled tick marks are shown before 100 milliliters and there are 3 unlabeled tick marks between every 2 labeled tick marks. The smoothie inside the graduated cylinder measures to the first unlabeled tick mark above 600 milliliters. A line extends from the first unlabeled tick mark above 600 milliliters and is labeled 625 milliliters. !

hints.content:
To find the amount of smoothie left for Ahmed, we subtract the number of $\text{mL}$ he gave his brother $(\blueD{320 \text { mL}})$  from the total number of $\text{mL}$ he made $(\maroonD{625 \text { mL}})$.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: Two rectangles sit on top of each other. The top rectangle is labeled 625 milliliters. A curved bracket across the top rectangle is labeled Smoothie volume. The bottom rectangle is divided into 2 parts. The slightly longer left part is labeled 320 milliliters. The slightly shorter right part is labeled with a question mark. A curved bracket across the slightly longer left part of the bottom rectangle is labeled Ahmed’s brother. A curved bracket across the slightly shorter right part of the bottom rectangle is labeled Ahmed. !

hints.content: Ahmed has $\greenD{305\text { mL}}$  of fruit smoothie left to drink.

question.content:
Ahmed made a fruit smoothie in his blender, shown below. 

[[☃ image 1]]

He gave $320$ milliliters of the smoothie to his brother.   

**How much smoothie is left for Ahmed to drink?**  

[[☃ input-number 1]] milliliters

options.alt: A graduated cylinder labeled with tick marks from 100 milliliters to 700 milliliters. Tick marks 100, 200, 300, 400, 500, 600, and 700 milliliters are labeled. 3 unlabeled tick marks are shown before 100 milliliters and there are 3 unlabeled tick marks between every 2 labeled tick marks. The smoothie inside the graduated cylinder measures to the first unlabeled tick mark above 600 milliliters. !
